Package index

All functions

aggregate2adm()
Aggregate raster files to adm level
align_raster()
Both clips a raster to polygon and aligns it to reference grid
clip_country()
Function to clip national maps from global WorldPop sex and age disaggregated population maps
create_folders()
Creates ssid folder structure
create_model_template()
Creates ssid model template
extract_output()
Extract weights and diagnostics from spatial simulation object
extract_weight_plots()
Extract figures with with weight distribution
fix_outlier_iqr()
Function to fix outliers using interquartile range
fix_outlier_quantile()
Function to fix outliers using quantile approach
